metaDescription: 최고의 치아 파밍 풀의 목록을 완성하세요. 모든 풀은 검증되고 공시됩니다. 풀 수수료, 네트워크 스페이스, 블록 높이, 가장 최근 블록 보상 등을 비교하세요.
heading: 파밍 풀
치아 풀 리스팅 정보

table.heading: 치아 파밍 풀 리스팅하기
table.uptimeWarning: For this pool, {{success}} of the last {{all}} checks were successful
table.netspaceWarning: Netspace cannot be verified, missing pool address
table.netspaceError: The reported pool netspace by {{name}} is less then the calculated pool netspace based on the number of rewards over the past 7 days.
table.netspaceSuccess: Pool netspace is calculted and verified

notice: The pool stats we show are based on API data provided by the pool operators and should be taken with caution.
